net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_RollExpression_getFormattedOutput
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Looks at the highlevel rolls and generates output

arg(0) = The rolled expression
arg(1) = Optional: Flag indicating that the ouput is to be returned

Formatted text is sent to chat if arg(1) is not set or false for the selected token
Otherwise the text is returned to the calling function
